definition: determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: But it was this sense of failure that made him determined to succeed in his new life.
sentences.chinese: 但就是这种失败感使他决心在新的生活中取得成功。

sentences.english: He is determined to devote his life to sicence.
sentences.chinese: 他决心把毕生精力贡献给科学事业。

sentences.english: Arsenal goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny is determined to hold on to his Arsenal place next season.
sentences.chinese: 什琴斯尼下定决心要在下赛季保住他的首发地位。

sentences.english: Althogh I tried to pursuade him to stop smoking, he still could not make his mind.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我尽力劝他别抽烟了，他还是下不了决心。

sentences.english: Beattie's solution to the Franklin mystery took four expeditions and Simonson is not expecting miracles.
sentences.chinese: 比泰决心解开富兰克林探险队作过四次探险运动之迷。

sentences.english: Do not drop your determination which you wanted to just because of a casw of crabs.
sentences.chinese: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。

sentences.english: What persuaded you to start Global Voices in Bangla?
sentences.chinese: 是什么使你决心开展孟加拉版的全球之声？

sentences.english: Again determined to rule out a reaction to textures, the neurologists tested her with colored light.
sentences.chinese: 再次决心排除反应纹理，神经学家测试与彩色光她。

sentences.english: Her drive and determination won her a place close to Murdoch.
sentences.chinese: 她的干劲和决心为她赢得了接近默多克的位置。

sentences.english: The person that ends up a winner,is the one who resolves to win.
sentences.chinese: 最终的赢家就是下定决心要赢的那个人。

sentences.english: Live is just a series of trying to maske up your mind.
sentences.chinese: 生活只是由一次次下决心的努力所够成。

sentences.english: Some resolutions have to do with better planning, like making a weekly plan for schoolwork.
sentences.chinese: 有些决心是与更好地计划有关，比如为学习做周计划。

sentences.english: If your resolution is buzzing through your head, it’s easier to stick to it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的决心“余音绕梁”，那么就更容易坚持。

sentences.english: Make up your mind, you’ll never use crutches or a stick, then have a go at everything.
sentences.chinese: 下定决心之后，你就永远不会需要拐杖或者棍子。

sentences.english: You just need the discipline and determination to see it through.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的只是训练和坚持到底的决心。

sentences.english: Success and determination are intimate siblings. Talent is merely success's distant cousin.
sentences.chinese: 成功和决心是亲兄弟亲姐妹。

definition: lit. to break the cauldrons and sink the boats (idiom); fig. to cut off one's means of retreat/to burn one's boats
to put one's all into the fight

pinyin: bu4 cheng2 gong1 bian4 cheng2 ren2
